InstallationÂ¶

Bagpipes setup is a fairly quick process:

  1. Clone the Bagpipes GitHub repository.
  2. Download the model files (currently only BC03 are pre-packaged) from Google drive here, untar them and put the resulting “bc03_miles” folder in the “bagpipes/models” folder.
  3. Add the “bagpipes” folder to your PYTHONPATH variable
  4. Install the Python package dependencies (astropy, corner) and you’re ready to run the first example file.
  5. For fitting to be supported you must also install MultiNest and the Python interface PyMultiNest which can be installed with pip.
